title: Yosemite National Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved                   Celebrate a park milestone and the NPS...               Learn about volunteering in Yosemite               Work with us or one of our partners               Help us plan for the future of Yosemite         Â     NPS Centennial and Yosemite Anniversaries 2014 through 2016 is a time of anniversaries, including the 150th of Yosemite's original protection under federal law (1864) as well as the centennial of the formation of the National Park Service.   Park Partners Yosemite National Park relies on several partners to protect the park and provide an excellent experience for visitors. Yosemite also partners with national parks in other countries for mutual benefits.   Donate You can make donations to two of Yosemite's non-profit partners: Yosemite Conservancy and NatureBridge.   Volunteer Yosemite has a large and vibrant volunteer program, welcoming people from all over the world into a variety of positions.   Work With Us The National Park Service and several other organizations have employment opportunities.   Do Business With Us Find information about commercial use authorizations and other permits.   Park Planning Find information about park planning efforts, such as the Merced River Plan and Tuolumne River Plan.
